title: *NEW SNOWDOWN SKIN IDEA* Poro Wanna-be Gnar
body:
I think this would make a great feature to the snowdown skin collection.

Mini Gnar would be wearing a poro onesie and his boomerang would be an icicle. Mega Gnar would be a big bulky poro :)
 

Mini Gnar Abilities
Q-Throws out and icicle
W-The stacks when they hit 3 would make a snow flake(each stack is part of a snowflake)
E-Basically the same

Mega Gnar Abilities
Q-Throws out an ice block or big snowball
W-Same animation but with an icy outline
E-The pattern left on the ground is a snowflake 
R-Basically the same

Overall i think this would be a GNARly skin along with a great addition to the snowdown skins.

replies.body: I hope you guys like the idea!
Mega Gnar could possibly have a Poro King feel. I love this idea, Gnar is adorbs.

Wow, I had a similar idea a while ago and posted a very brief thread about it yesterday. I like the idea and hope Riot sees one of our posts, good luck Aggronmagmortar.
- NiftyNinja (OCE)
